## Template Usage Notes

**Delete this section before submitting!**

### YAML Frontmatter Guidelines:
- **title:** Full descriptive title
- **category:** Choose ONE from the list
- **tags:** 3-5 relevant keywords
- **relevance_to_hypercode:** How important is this?
- **key_insights:** 3-5 one-sentence takeaways
- **related_topics:** Slugs of related entries (lowercase-with-hyphens)
- **citations:** At least 2 sources with URLs

### Writing Tips:
- Use emojis strategically for visual scanning
- Keep paragraphs short (3-5 sentences)
- Use headings to create hierarchy
- Bold important terms on first use
- Include code examples when possible
- Link to related research
- Explain jargon and acronyms
- Write for accessibility (screen readers, dyslexia)

### Quality Checklist:
- [ ] YAML frontmatter complete
- [ ] All sections filled out
- [ ] Sources cited properly
- [ ] Links tested and working
- [ ] No TODOs or placeholders
- [ ] Proofread for clarity
- [ ] Related topics cross-linked
- [ ] Added to category index
